issue.title: [CF 556] Using a "track power" cooldown seems to unset "ignore gcd"...
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Groups have ignore GCD checked
2. Setup a few Spell Cooldown button with no power check
3. Setup a single Spell Cooldown button with power check on
4. Use tmw ... as long as you do not use the power check ability, the icons stay solid when appropriate and disregard GCD
5. If you use the spell with the power check, then all the other spells begin flashing off/on with the GCD.
6. Reloading ui or enter/exit tmw config temporarily fixes until you use the power-checked spell again

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
GCD behaviour should be consistent. :)

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.0.2. r599

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

As instructed ... profile string:

> Posted by CurseForge user Stanoslav | Imported from CurseForge issue #556 | Raw

comments.body:
Looks like this issue is actually because TMW uses Victory rush as the warrior spell to detect GCDs with. Since Impending Victory shares a cooldown with it, TMW thinks that the GCD is 30 seconds long instead of just 1.5.

Issue should be fixed in r560.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Just wanted to say thanks for fixing this bug. I tested it and everything (for this item) works as expected. Stanoslav


> Posted by CurseForge user Stanoslav
